greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: 1 if n is a prime power p^k (k >= 0), otherwise 0.
comment: Characteristic function of unit or prime powers p^k (k >= 1). Characteristic function of prime powers p^k (k >= 0). - _Daniel Forgues_, Mar 03 2009
See A065515 for partial sums. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 22 2009
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Dirichlet generating function: 1 + ppzeta(s). Here ppzeta(s) = Sum_{p prime} Sum_{k>=1} 1/(p^k)^s. Note that ppzeta(s) = Sum_{p prime} 1/(p^s-1) = Sum_{k>=1} primezeta(k*s). - _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Sep 11 2005
a(n) = if A001221(n) <= 1 then 1, otherwise 0. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 28 2015
If n >= 2, a(n) = A069513(n). - _Jeppe Stig Nielsen_, Feb 02 2016
Conjecture: a(n) = (n - A048671(n))/A000010(n) for all n > 1. - _Velin Yanev_, Mar 10 2021 [The conjecture is true. - _Andrey Zabolotskiy_, Mar 11 2021]
program: a010055 n = if a001221 n <= 1 then 1 else 0
xref: Cf. A069513 (1 if n is a prime power p^k (k >= 1), else 0.)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
ext: More terms from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Mar 12 2008
Comment re Galois fields moved to A069513 by _Franklin T. Adams-Watters_, Nov 02 2009
